title: Our ‘Blue Christmas’ Gift Exchange + Raymundo’s Final Engagement Update of the Year: Will He Return From Break Engaged?
itunes:title: Our ‘Blue Christmas’ Gift Exchange + Raymundo’s Final Engagement Update of the Year: Will He Return From Break Engaged?
description:
We have our Bobby Bones Show ‘Blue Christmas’ gift exchange. We all had to buy one person on the show a ‘blue’ colored gift. We also get one last engagement update from Raymundo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
